question: Who will be conferred with the France's highest order of merit 'Legion of Honour at the 42nd International Kolkata Book Fair 2018?
explanation: Soumitra Chattopadhyay (82), the legendary film and theatre actor, will be conferred with the France's highest order of merit Legion of Honour at the 42nd International Kolkata Book Fair 2018. The honour will be bestowed on the actor who starred in many of Satyajit Ray's iconic films by French culture and communication minister Francoise Nyssen in Kolkata. The book fair will open on January 30 and conclude on February 11. Chattopadhyay acted in several of Ray's films,including Apur Sansar, Abhijan, Charulata, Aranyer Din Ratri and Sonar Kella.
